select id, role_code, role_name, tenant_id, deleted, enabled from sys_role sr where sr.enabled = 1 and sr.deleted = 0 and sr.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
and sr.role_code like concat(concat('%',#{roleCode}),'%')
and sr.role_name like concat(concat('%',#{roleName}),'%')
order by role_code

select id, role_code, role_name, tenant_id, deleted, enabled from sys_role sr where sr.enabled = 1 and sr.deleted = 0
and sr.role_code like concat(concat('%',#{roleCode}),'%')
and sr.role_name like concat(concat('%',#{roleName}),'%')
and exists ( select 1 from sys_user_role sur where sur.role_id = sr.id and sur.enabled = 1 and sur.user_id = #{userId} ) order by role_code
select count(0) from sys_user_role sur where sur.enabled = 1 and sur.user_id = #{userId}
